name: Freed Souls: A They Die Tomorrow Story
name_original: Freed Souls: A They Die Tomorrow Story
description:
Made in a week for the GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022!

You find yourself in an ominous home. Its inhabitants disappeared unexpectedly a while ago, and you're here to figure out what happened to them. Search for clues about what happened, and don't be afraid to take risks to find the truth.

Features 2 characters from our co-op investigative horror game They Die Tomorrow, out on Steam now. 

Multiple endings to find! Enjoy :)
